hh3cDhcpSnoop.name: hh3cDhcpSnoop
hh3cDhcpSnoop.contactinfo: Platform Team Hangzhou H3C Tech. Co., Ltd. Hai-Dian District Beijing P.R. China http://www.h3c.com Zip:100085
hh3cDhcpSnoop.description: The private MIB file includes the DHCP Snooping profile.

hh3cDhcpSnoopTable.name: hh3cDhcpSnoopTable
hh3cDhcpSnoopTable.description: The table containing information of DHCP clients listened by DHCP snooping and it's enabled or disabled by setting hh3cDhcpSnoopEnable node.

hh3cDhcpSnoopEntry.name: hh3cDhcpSnoopEntry
hh3cDhcpSnoopEntry.description: An entry containing information of DHCP clients.

hh3cDhcpSnoopClientIpAddressType.name: hh3cDhcpSnoopClientIpAddressType
hh3cDhcpSnoopClientIpAddressType.description: DHCP clients' IP addresses type (IPv4 or IPv6).

hh3cDhcpSnoopClientIpAddress.name: hh3cDhcpSnoopClientIpAddress
hh3cDhcpSnoopClientIpAddress.description: DHCP clients' IP addresses collected by DHCP snooping.

hh3cDhcpSnoopClientMacAddress.name: hh3cDhcpSnoopClientMacAddress
hh3cDhcpSnoopClientMacAddress.description: DHCP clients' MAC addresses collected by DHCP snooping.

hh3cDhcpSnoopClientProperty.name: hh3cDhcpSnoopClientProperty
hh3cDhcpSnoopClientProperty.description: Method of getting IP addresses collected by DHCP snooping.

hh3cDhcpSnoopClientUnitNum.name: hh3cDhcpSnoopClientUnitNum
hh3cDhcpSnoopClientUnitNum.description: IRF (Intelligent Resilient Fabric) unit number via whom the clients get their IP addresses. The value 0 means this device does not support IRF.

hh3cDhcpSnoopTrustTable.name: hh3cDhcpSnoopTrustTable
hh3cDhcpSnoopTrustTable.description: A table is used to configure and monitor port trusted status.

hh3cDhcpSnoopTrustEntry.name: hh3cDhcpSnoopTrustEntry
hh3cDhcpSnoopTrustEntry.description: An entry containing information about trusted status of ports.

hh3cDhcpSnoopTrustStatus.name: hh3cDhcpSnoopTrustStatus
hh3cDhcpSnoopTrustStatus.description: Trusted status of current port which supports both get and set operation.

hh3cDhcpSnoopVlanTable.name: hh3cDhcpSnoopVlanTable
hh3cDhcpSnoopVlanTable.description: A table is used to configure and monitor DHCP Snooping status of VLANs.

hh3cDhcpSnoopVlanEnable.name: hh3cDhcpSnoopVlanEnable
hh3cDhcpSnoopVlanEnable.description: DHCP Snooping status of current VLAN.

hh3cDhcpSnoopSpoofServerMac.name: hh3cDhcpSnoopSpoofServerMac
hh3cDhcpSnoopSpoofServerMac.description: MAC address of the spoofing server and it is derived from link-layer header of offer packet. If the offer packet is relayed by dhcp relay entity, it may be the MAC address of relay entity.

hh3cDhcpSnoopSpoofServerIP.name: hh3cDhcpSnoopSpoofServerIP
hh3cDhcpSnoopSpoofServerIP.description: IP address of the spoofing server and it is derived from IP header of offer packet. A tricksy host may send offer packet use other host's address, so this address can not always be trust.

hh3cDhcpSnoopSpoofServerDetected.name: hh3cDhcpSnoopSpoofServerDetected
hh3cDhcpSnoopSpoofServerDetected.description: To detect unauthorized DHCP servers on a network, the DHCP snooping device sends DHCP-DISCOVER messages through its downstream port (which is connected to the DHCP clients). If any response (DHCP-OFFER message) is received from the downstream port, an unauthorized DHCP server is considered present, and then the device sends a trap. With unauthorized DHCP server detection enabled, the interface sends a DHCP-DISCOVER message to detect unauthorized DHCP servers on the network. If this interface receives a DHCP-OFFER message, the DHCP server which sent it is considered unauthorized.
